name: ThroneDoor
_source: speak;Leap;Here to see Duke Hogarth, sir!
speak;Leap;A commoner who has something to ask of him...
speak;SoldierWhite;You don't seem from around here.
speak;SoldierWhite;Well, I'm sure Marquess Zio would make more se-
speak;Leap;Please, I've already been let in by the guards.|I'll make this quick.
speak;SoldierWhite;Alright.|Duke Hogarth! A visitor is here for you!
